title: Adventures of Wallanders
description: A secret life of mysterious scripts left on the wall of an ancient maze. A volcanic island which erupted poisonous gases and is full of mysterious knowledge.Wallanders:- They left in Labyrinth.-- They play chess standing up side down.-- One of them looks for super powers.-- They are able to cross corners.-- Pyramid temple took one of them.-- They faced power of magic substance.--A Happy End.-
author: Alex Letner
